name: Killing Spree
description:
WASD, Hold right click to aim!

My first ever game, produced in Unity 2020. Its a short, stressful, top-down shooting game which pits your cyborg-like character against five waves of enemies, followed by a sixth wave with a simple but challenging boss fight. Due to the length of the game, death is permanent and will reset you.

There are hints available on the main menu, and i recommend you read them. Criticism is welcome, although i will not be expanding upon this project. 

ALL art is my own, produced in aseprite, and the simple sound tracks are my own too. The sounds are taken from freesound.org.

Thank you for viewing the page, even if you didnt download it! 

NOTE: Antivirus may try and stop your game from launching due to it being completely unknown, I can assure you its just a unity build.
